projects.title: This Website
projects.summary: The website is built using React and Next.js, providing a smooth and responsive user experience. The entire website is designed as a single-page application, resembling a one-page resume.

projects.title: Fitness Tracker
projects.summary: This project was developed by a team of three developers. I have implemented most of the backend, specifically login/sign-up and recipes filtering functionality.

projects.title: Natours API
projects.summary: Natours API developed as a RESTful api powered by Express and MongoDB. some features are: geographical filtering, pagination and result filtering, JWT authentication and rule-based authorization

projects.title: Natours website
projects.summary: Natours is a dynamically rendered website powered by NodeJS and Pug templates. This project was the final project of an online course.

projects.title: Homestay DB
projects.summary: HomestayDB is a homestay database for managing accommodations, contracts, and reviews between Canadian families and international students.

certificates.title: Introduction to Object-Oriented Programming with Java

about.title: Passion for Programming
about.description: To me, programming is a journey of continuous growth and intellectual exploration. It's the art of stretching my skills and thinking beyond conventional limits to craft solutions that tackle challenges head-on.

about.title: Navigating the Road Ahead
about.description: I am driven by a strong passion for problem-solving, a trait I carry proudly into the programming domain. My vision is set on software engineering, with my sights extending into the realm of AI.

about.title: Life Beyond the Screen
about.description: I approach life with an easy-going spirit, and the laughter that accompanies my journey is a testament to my love for humor. Yet beneath this exterior lies a wellspring of determination and discipline that propels me in ventures of life.

about.title: Balancing Growth, Learning and Life
about.description: I believe in honing my knowledge through continuous learning, fuelling both personal growth and enriching life's fabric. My life's vision is multidimensional; equilibrium isn't the goal. Instead, I embrace diverse challenges and imbalances, finding balance in the bigger picture.
